question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. donuts
B. coffee cup
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The coffee cup is partially obscured by the donuts and appears to be behind them in the scene, suggesting it is further away from the camera. However, the 2D image makes precise depth judgment difficult without a depth map.
